name: Innozilla Table Rate Shipping for WooCommerce
author: Innozilla

sections.description:
This is a WooCommerce Table Rate Shipping extenstion that can set multiple shipping rates based on weight, item count and price.

HOW TO USE THE PLUGIN

FEATURES

  • DEFINE RULES based on WEIGHT (kg, lbs, grams, oz).
  • DEFINE RULES based on QUANTITY (min-max)
  • DEFINE RULES by CLASS
  • DEFINE CALCULATION TYPE (per order, rates per item, line item & per class)
  • DEFINE CLASS PRIORITIES
  • Can set Per row price
  • Can set Per item cost
  • Can set Custom shipping label

NOT SURE ABOUT THIS PLUGIN? – TALK TO US!

  • PLUGIN QUESTIONS?
  • Click Here to talk to our LIVE CHAT support personnel

PREMIUM FEATURES

  • ONE TIME PAYMENT with FREE support…
  • LIFETIME FREE UPDATES (future compatibility proof)
  • MULTILINGUAL SUPPORT (you can use other 3rd party multilingual plugins to add languages to this plugin)
  • UNLIMITED ROW Condition
  • UNLIMITED RULES based on WEIGHT (kg, lbs, grams, oz)
  • UNLIMITED RULES based on QUANTITY (min-max)
  • UNLIMITED RULES based on CLASS
  • Add cost PER ROW, PER ITEM COST, PERCENT COST and LABEL
  • DEFINE CLASS PRIORITIES and CALCULATION TYPE
  • UNLIMITED TABLE RATE RULES based on your specification etc..
  • FREE Plugin Consultation
  • 24/7 Chat Support.

You can get the PRO Version here!

note: We offer lifetime free updates for the PRO version of the plugin.

Innozilla Table Rate Shipping WooCommerce plugin is an addon for WooCommerce which needs to be installed on your WordPress website.

This plugin requires the WooCommerce plugin

For Plugin Customization you can contact Innozilla

  • Innozilla Conditional Shipping and Payments for WooCommerce
  • Innozilla Table Rate Shipping for WooCommerce
  • Innozilla Skins for Contact Form 7
  • Innozilla Image Gallery 8

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/innozilla-table-rate-shipping-woocommerce.zip’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How to use this plugin?

We have a full documentation on how to use the plugin.
https://innozilla.com/wordpress-plugins/woocommerce-table-rate-shipping/#documentation

I still got questions. Where can I find the answers?

Please open a support ticket in the forum. We will get back to you within 24 hours.

sections.reviews:
Not OK

By dawidt on September 22, 2023

Most of the important features are available in pro version. The problem is that plugins like this one is extremely waste of time. You're trying to set quite simple shipment rule, you take some time to do it, and all variations you imagined somehow needs a pro. It's useless as a freeware. None of this is user friendly, it's all about to trick somebody to pay for it. Not OK.

Satisfied customer here...

By willknott on July 30, 2021

This is my 2nd time using a plugin from innozilla plugins and they really did a great job... Thank you for making plugins relating to woocommerce shipping. Thanks

Thank you!!!

By skyconnell on May 18, 2021

I have been thankful to the support that helped me out on my shipping rules. they helped me on finding solution to my shipping rules. I purchased the pro version and it really did the job! Great Support and Great Plugin! Cheers from Australia!

Wonderful Plugin!

By teartachel on May 3, 2021

Before, i have been having problems with my shipping requirements, then i found this Advance plugin where i added logical rules on the plugin. It really work well on my shipping! BTW I'm using the PRO version of this plugin. Thank you

GREAT Plugin and GREAT SUPPORT!

By BHG1313 (BHGDigital) on October 2, 2020

This plugin has made shipping variables SO much easier! Support has been AMAZING, quick responses and resolutions! HIGHLY recommend this plugin!

Great!

By maragotti on July 21, 2020

Great plugin! It allows to create complex combinations. The developer is very helpful and professional. Recommended!
